Rule Info: The IAM user, role, or group uses AWS managed policies.

Exception Reason: [Resource::*] Wildcard permission required by Cognito for SMS MFA functionality. This is AWS Cognito managed behavior.
Rule Info: The IAM entity contains wildcard permissions and does not have a cdk-nag rule suppression with evidence for those permission.
The Cognito user pool does not have a password policy that minimally specify a password length of at least 8 characters, as well as requiring uppercase, numeric, and special characters.
The Cognito user pool does not require MFA.

Exception Reason: Advanced Security Mode requires Cognito Plus plan. For production deployments, customers should upgrade to enable advanced security features.
Rule Info: The Cognito user pool does not have AdvancedSecurityMode set to ENFORCED.
The Cognito identity pool allows for unauthenticated logins and does not have a cdk-nag rule suppression with a reason.
The IAM user, role, or group uses AWS managed policies.
The IAM entity contains wildcard permissions and does not have a cdk-nag rule suppression with evidence for those permission.

Exception Reason: [Policy::arn:<AWS::Partition>:iam::aws:policy/service-role/AWSLambdaBasicExecutionRole] AWSLambdaBasicExecutionRole is AWS managed policy for Lambda execution. Required for CloudWatch Logs access.
Rule Info: The IAM user, role, or group uses AWS managed policies.

The non-container Lambda function is not configured to use the latest runtime version.

Exception Reason: Request validation handled by Lambda function. Input validation implemented in application code.
Rule Info: The REST API does not have request validation enabled.

Exception Reason: Access logging disabled for AWS Sample to reduce costs. Customers should enable CloudWatch Logs in production deployments.
Rule Info: The API does not have access logging enabled.
The REST API stage is not associated with AWS WAFv2 web ACL.

Exception Reason: CloudWatch logging disabled for AWS Sample to reduce costs. Customers should enable in production deployments.
Rule Info: The REST API Stage does not have CloudWatch logging enabled for all methods.
The API does not implement authorization.
The API GW method does not use a Cognito user pool authorizer.
The S3 Bucket has server access logs disabled.
The S3 Bucket does not have public access restricted and blocked.
The S3 static website bucket either has an open world bucket policy or does not use a CloudFront Origin Access Identity (OAI) in the bucket policy for limited getObject and/or putObject permissions.
The S3 Bucket or bucket policy does not require requests to use SSL.
The S3 Bucket or bucket policy does not require requests to use SSL.
The CloudFront distribution may require Geo restrictions.
The CloudFront distribution may require integration with AWS WAF.

Exception Reason: CloudFront access logging disabled for AWS Sample to reduce costs. Customers should enable in production deployments.
Rule Info: The CloudFront distribution does not have access logging enabled.

Exception Reason: Using default CloudFront certificate for simplicity in AWS Sample. Customers should use custom certificate with TLS 1.2+ in production.
Rule Info: The CloudFront distribution allows for SSLv3 or TLSv1 for HTTPS viewer connections.
The CloudFront distributions uses SSLv3 or TLSv1 for communication to the origin.
The CloudFront distribution does not use an origin access control with an S3 origin.
